title: Come home to Essex Apartments! Washer/dryer in unit. Tour today!
posting_body: ['Essex Apartments', 'Located at: 1 Avalon Dr Peabody, MA 01960', 'Featured unit: 2 bed | 2 bath | 1225 sq ft', 'Prices start at: $3120 - $3975/month', 'Call Today!', '(844) 800-3206', 'YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'Essex Apartments is a luxury apartment complex located in Peabody, MA offering one and two bedroom apartments.', 'We offer multiple amenities available to residents including a beautiful fitness center, sparkling pool with a sundeck, and a landscape barbeque patio!', 'If you are interested in a 1 or 2 apartment we encourage you to check out our floor plans or contact our leasing office for more information.', 'Wonderful Amenities!', '− 10 Minutes From the Coastline', '− 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', '− Close to North Shore Mall', '− Easy Access to New Hampshire', '− Easy Access to Route 1 and 128', '− High-speed WiFi Internet Available', '− Online Payments Available', '− On-Site Management Team', '− Pet-Friendly Community', '− Resident Clubhouse', '− Beautifully Landscaped Barbecue and Picnic Area', '− Community-Sponsored Social Events for Residents and Friends', '− Complimentary Package Acceptance Service', '− Free WiFi Available in Common Areas', '− Located Near Public Transportation', '− Smart Rain Sensors Used to Reduce Water Consumption', '− Sparkling Swimming Pool with Sundeck', '− State-of-the-Art Fitness Center with Cardio and Strength Equipment', '− Sustainable Lighting Techniques to Reduce Energy Consumption', 'Apartment Features!', '− All Apartments with In-Unit Washer/Dryer', '− Central Air Conditioning', '− Disability Access', '− Flexible Lease Terms Available', '− On-site Storage Units Available', '− Plush Wall to Wall Carpeting', '− Private Balcony and Patio', '− Separate Dining Rooms In Select Apartments', '− Spacious Closets', '− Sustainable Apartment Plumbing Fixtures and HVAC Equipment', '(844) 800-3206', 'Hours:', 'Tue - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Terms:', '4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month', 'Pet Policy:', '$500 Deposit.', '$75 Monthly Pet Rent.', '75 lb Weight Limit.', '2 Pet Limit.', 'Income must be at least three times the rent.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'E3915803387E4C4']
